commands.name: example
commands.reminder_message: This will get updated periodically if active
commands.response: Response for custom messages, not applicable for built in commands

commands.name: hello
commands.help: Says hello to the user that triggered the command

commands.name: slots
commands.reminder_message: Gamble nothing to see if you get a jackpot
commands.response: Gamble nothing to see if you get a jackpot
commands.help: Roll 3 random emotes and see if you get a jackpot

commands.name: svote
commands.reminder_message: Remember to guess with !vote h:mm:ss or a number!
commands.help: Starts a new voting session. You can start it with the time in seconds or hour, minutes and/or seconds, and you can give it a name for saving the votes and results in a csv file. !svote h:mm:ss file_name

commands.name: extend
commands.help: Extends the current voting session with the amount of time you supply it. !extend h:mm:ss

commands.name: result
commands.reminder_message: Displays the winners of the voting session
commands.response: Displays the winners of the voting session
commands.help: Displays the winners of the voting session. !result h:mm:ss or a number

commands.name: vote
commands.reminder_message: Votes on a time or number
commands.response: Votes on a time or number
commands.help: Votes on a time or number. !vote h:mm:ss or a number

commands.name: myvote
commands.reminder_message: Responds with the time or number you voted on
commands.response: Responds with the time or number you voted on
commands.help: Responds with the time or number you voted on

commands.name: help
commands.reminder_message: Returns all commands available or instructions for a single command.
commands.response: Returns all commands available or instructions for a single command.
commands.help: Returns all commands available or instructions for a single command. !help or !help command
